0.text: Hi there, welcome to the emergency alert app. To start with, we have two questions. (1/2) What’s your name?

1.text: Thanks for the answer, one more question to go! (2/2) What’s your emergency contact’s number?

2.text: Great, we are ready to go! Please let us know anytime you need to set an alarm!

text.resp: Be safe! The app will check up on you in the set time.
text.check: Your trip is over! Please reply ok within 5 minutes so we know you are okay. Or we will send an alert message to your emergency contact.
